titleStmt.title: The law of charitable uses. Wherein the statute of 43. Eliz. chap. 4. is set forth and explained; with directions how to sue out and prosecute commissions grounded upon that statute: also presidents, inquisitions, and decrees, with divers judgements, and resolutions upon exceptions and appeals against decrees; and other proceedings upon the said statute. By John Herne.
titleStmt.author: Herne, John, fl. 1660.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.R. for Timothy Twyford, and are to be sold at his shop, within the Inner-Temple-gate,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
